instructions.step_1: Replace 'video_path' with actual paths to your test videos
instructions.step_2: Update 'transcript' with what is ACTUALLY said in the video (ground truth)
instructions.step_5: View results in HTML report and JSON files

notes: Ground truth transcripts should be manually verified for accuracy
Translation ground truth can be from human translators or verified MT
Include diverse test cases: different speakers, noise levels, domains
Minimum 10-20 test cases recommended for robust evaluation
Balance test cases across different language pairs
